text:
HJS:
I believe you saw my 6/13 letter to Clair
(the attached ywllow carbon), but I am including
it just in case you didn't. His letter makes
me wonder a little. Do you interpret his
3rd paragraph to mean that he is expecting
a consultation fee from us (I didn't recall that
that was in the "bargain"), or do you think he
is merely using the term in the same sense I
intended it in the second paragraph of my letter?
I think the latter (based on his letter of 6/10,
also attached), but I guess his latest wording
sorta worried me - so your comments will be
appreciated.
heh
6/21/60
